title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7417.5 - Religious diets
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7417.5 - Religious diets

State Regulations

Pursuant to the requirements of section
7425.6
of this Title, residents are
entitled to observe reasonable dietary laws established by their religion. Each
secure facility shall provide residents with food items reasonably sufficient
to meet such religious dietary laws. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7417.5

Renumbered from subtitle AA of chapter III
New

York State Register April 11, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 15, eff. 4/11/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
